## üõ†Ô∏è Canada Holidays MCP Server ‚úÖ 6 operations

### About
This API lists all 31 public holidays for all 13 provinces and territories in Canada, including federal holidays.

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the Canada Holidays API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://canada-holidays.ca
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent


### üìã Available Operations (6 endpoints)

**Info (2 operations)**
Get API Root, Get API Schema

**Holidays (2 operations)**
List All Holidays, Get Holiday by ID

**Provinces (2 operations)**
List All Provinces, Get Province by ID
